Not started.. 15/3970 Construction of a three storey new build development consisting of 8 residential units (Class C3) including 5 x 2-bedroom flats and 3 x 1-bedroom flats, plus associated secure bicycle parking and refuse storage areas.
Not started.. 17/0599 Construction of a two storey rear extension and conversion of property to provide 5 self-contained flats (2x1-bed, 3x2-bed).

site-address: The Sorting Office, 31-37 Greenwich Park Street
notes: Not started.. 17/1377 Redevelopment of the site to create nine residential units (4 x 2-bed and 5 x 3-bed).

Not started.. 17/1441 Demolition of existing dwelling and construction of a part 2/part 2.5-storey building providing 6 apartments (2x1-bed, 2x2-bed, 2x3-bed) with associated landscaping, refuse and bicycle store.

Not started.. 17/1795 Demolition of existing warehouse and redevelopment of the site to provide 330 residential units in blocks ranging from 2-10 storeys, creation of 439 sqm of community floorspace (Use Class D1) in a part 1 / 2 storey block, 999 m2 (Use Class B1) in a 3 storey block, 144 car parking spaces and associated cycle parking, refuse and landscaping.

Not started.. 17/1805 Construction of a part 1/part 2-storey rear and side extension with loft conversion to facilitate the formation of 5 residential units (2 x studios, 2 x 1-bed, 1 x 2-bed) on first and second floors including associated landscaping works

site-address: Majestic Wine Warehouse, 123 Greenwich South Street

Not started.. 17/1916 Outline planning permission (Appearence, Landscaping and Scale Reserved) for the demolition of existing building and construction of 2 x 4-bed dwellings and 2 x 2-bed and 1 x 3-bed flats with associated parking, cycle storage and refuse.

Not started.. 17/2178 Demolition of existing buildings and construction of a 4 storey (including basement) development comprising 4 x 3 bedroom houses; 1 x 2 bedroom and 2 x 1 bedroom units; 4 x domestic outbuildings and associated works.

Not started.. 17/2190 Construction of one two-storey side extension with loft, basement, rear dormer and two front rooflights. Construction of one three-storey side extension with basement. Construction of two rear dormer windows, insertion of two front roof lights to main roof. Creation of four new self-contained flats in addition to existing four self-contained flats.

Not started.. 17/2868 Construction of two additional floors including alterations and additions to first floor, and new 4 storey rear extension for the creation of 6x1-bedroom flats, communal garden, and ancillary works.
Not started.. 17/3226 Demolition of existing units and construction of 8 residential dwellings (6x3-bed and 2x2-bed) 6 fronting Woodrow and 2 fronting Godfrey Road.

Not started.. 17/3754 Demolition of the existing building to allow for the construction of 5 no. Apartments (3x 1 bedroom & 2x 2 bedroom) and associated works.
